description: Won IDE'25 Innovation Development & Entrepreneurship award, a national initiative by the Government of India. Led TRAFFIC GARUDEX LABS to build AI-powered product serving government needs, later pivoted to consumer and business markets for faster validation cycles.
highlights: Worked on end-to-end product development for TRAFFIC - AI solution addressing government sector needs
Navigated 3+ year government validation cycles and procurement challenges
Gained critical insights on market selection and startup sustainability in regulated sectors

description: End-to-end Online Testing Infrastructure with pilot 50+ active users
